TriggerOraclev10g.name: TRG_DATEGEN_DEL_AFTER_ROW
TriggerOraclev10g.body: DECLARE<br/> v_are_voie BOOLEAN := FALSE ;<br/>BEGIN <br/> FOR i IN 1..pac_variabile_globale.vg_roluri.COUNT LOOP<br/> IF pac_variabile_globale.vg_roluri (i) IN ('CORECTIE','DBA', 'CONTRACTE', 'RETRAGERE') THEN<br/> v_are_voie := TRUE ;<br/> END IF ; <br/> END LOOP ;<br/> IF v_are_voie = FALSE THEN<br/> RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR (-20150,'Nu aveti drepturi sa stergeti in DATEGEN') ; <br/> END IF ;<br/><br/> pac_variabile_globale.p_init_vg_atribute ('DATEGEN') ;<br/> SELECT seq_idmodif.NextVal INTO pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif FROM dual ;<br/> <br/> INSERT INTO admitere.modificari (idmodif, dataoram, operator, statiem, obs, cnp, tip_modif, tabela)<br/> VALUES (pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif,SYSDATE, <br/> admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_operator, <br/> admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_statie,<br/> 'DEL-DATEGEN', :OLD.cnp, 'D', 'DATEGEN') ; <br/> <br/> INSERT INTO admitere.DEL_dategen (<br/>CNP, NUME, SEX, STARECIV, NUMEINCAS, CAZARE, MEDICCMP, ROM, BASARABEAN, PASSWORD, <br/>DATANAST, LOCNAST, JUDNAST, TARANAST, BISERIE, BINR, BIELIBLA, BIELIBDE, TATA, MAMA, SAT, <br/>STRADA, NR, BLOC, ETAJ, APART, TEL, MOBIL, EMAIL, TARA, CODLICEU, ANABSOLV, MEDGENBAC, <br/>MEDLICAN5, MEDGENLIC, IDLOCNAST, IDLOCBI, CNPGRESIT, PRENUME, INITIALA_TATALUI, <br/>STAGIU_MILITAR, STUD_FACULT, STUD_AN, STUD_TAXA, STUD_NRSEM, STUD_STATPART,<br/>BUGET_STAT, BUGET_NRSEM, BURSA_STUD, BURSA_NRSEM, CODPOSTAL, CODFACULT, <br/>SPECIALIZARE_FACULT, ANABSOLV_FACULT, CETATENIE, NATIONALITATE, SCARA, MEDANISTUD, <br/>MEDLICENTA, CERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, TIPCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, <br/>TESTENGLEZA, PUNCTAJCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGV, OPTIUNEPTSTEC, ETNIE, <br/>STARESOCSPEC, PROFILLICEU, DURATALICEU, FORMAINVLICEU, NRACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, <br/>SERIEACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, ADMITERIMULTIPLE, DIZABILITATI, PROFILFACULTATE, <br/>TITLUFACULTATE, FORMAINVFACULT, FORMAFINANTAREFACULT, DURATAFACULTATE, <br/>TIPDIPLOMAFACULT, DIPLSERIEFACULT, DIPLNRFACULT, DIPLEMISDEFACULT, DIPLANEMITEREFACULT, <br/>FOAIEMATRFACULT, DIPLRECUNOASTERENRFACULT, DIPLRECUNOASTERESERIEFACULT, <br/>OLIMPIC, BIVALABILPANALA, ANABSOLVFACULTATE, MSDIPLOMAFACULTLAFEAA<br/> ) <br/> VALUES ( <br/>:old.CNP, :old.NUME, :old.SEX, :old.STARECIV, :old.NUMEINCAS, :old.CAZARE, :old.MEDICCMP, :old.ROM, :old.BASARABEAN, :old.PASSWORD, <br/>:old.DATANAST, :old.LOCNAST, :old.JUDNAST, :old.TARANAST, :old.BISERIE, :old.BINR, :old.BIELIBLA, :old.BIELIBDE, :old.TATA, :old.MAMA, :old.SAT,<br/> :old.STRADA, :old.NR, :old.BLOC, :old.ETAJ, :old.APART, :old.TEL, :old.MOBIL, :old.EMAIL, :old.TARA, :old.CODLICEU, :old.ANABSOLV, :old.MEDGENBAC,<br/> :old.MEDLICAN5, :old.MEDGENLIC, :old.IDLOCNAST, :old.IDLOCBI, :old.CNPGRESIT, :old.PRENUME, :old.INITIALA_TATALUI, <br/> :old.STAGIU_MILITAR, :old.STUD_FACULT, :old.STUD_AN, :old.STUD_TAXA, :old.STUD_NRSEM, :old.STUD_STATPART, <br/> :old.BUGET_STAT, :old.BUGET_NRSEM, :old.BURSA_STUD, :old.BURSA_NRSEM, :old.CODPOSTAL, :old.CODFACULT, <br/>:old.SPECIALIZARE_FACULT, :old.ANABSOLV_FACULT, :old.CETATENIE, :old.NATIONALITATE, :old.SCARA, :old.MEDANISTUD, <br/>:old.MEDLICENTA, :old.CERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, :old.TIPCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, <br/>:old.TESTENGLEZA, :old.PUNCTAJCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGV, :old.OPTIUNEPTSTEC, :old.ETNIE, <br/>:old.STARESOCSPEC, :old.PROFILLICEU, :old.DURATALICEU, :old.FORMAINVLICEU, :old.NRACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, <br/>:old.SERIEACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, :old.ADMITERIMULTIPLE, :old.DIZABILITATI, :old.PROFILFACULTATE, <br/>:old.TITLUFACULTATE, :old.FORMAINVFACULT, :old.FORMAFINANTAREFACULT, :old.DURATAFACULTATE, <br/> :old.TIPDIPLOMAFACULT, :old.DIPLSERIEFACULT, :old.DIPLNRFACULT, :old.DIPLEMISDEFACULT, :old.DIPLANEMITEREFACULT,<br/> :old.FOAIEMATRFACULT, :old.DIPLRECUNOASTERENRFACULT, :old.DIPLRECUNOASTERESERIEFACULT, <br/> :old.OLIMPIC, :old.BIVALABILPANALA, :old.ANABSOLVFACULTATE, :old.MSDIPLOMAFACULTLAFEAA <br/> );<br/> <br/> -- STERGEM IN CASCADA :1:2:3<br/> -- FISAINSCRIERE <br/> <br/>END ;<br/>
